an6.110:4.5: To give up these three things you should develop three things.
an6.110:4.7: You should develop perceptions of renunciation to give up perceptions of sensual desire, perceptions of love to give up perceptions of ill will, and perceptions of kindness to give up perceptions of harming.
an6.110:4.8: These are the three things you should develop to give up those three things.”
